name: Figsharesync
body:
### Figshare Sync.
Figshare Sync is a small application designed to synchronize your [Figshare](http://figshare.com/) data with local copies, and automatically keep the two up to date.

## Status
Please note that this is a very early stage version, so not everything may be working! File bug requests for any bugs your encounter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
